description:
The ninth pack of additional characters is here!

Introducing "Shikieiki Yamaxanadu" Supreme Judge of Hell!
She is a unique character with ability called "Cleansed Crystal Mirror" that can change Blank Bubble released from Blank Bubble Cashe into three colored bubble.

Also includes "AlternaCrime" by Girls Logic Observatory which features Ayaponzu* on vocals!

This pack contains the following:

■One character

Shikieiki Yamaxanadu

・Ability: When Bubble is dropped, Blank Bubble becomes colored babbles of three colors.
When you drop bubbles in your area, "Mirror Cache" will sometimes accumulate. Blank Bubble released from your Blank Bubble Cache will turn into colored bubbles of 3 colors equal to the number of "Mirror Cache".

・Spell Card
①Judgement "Guilty or Not Guilty"
Sends 4 "Judgment Bubble" into your opponent's area. If you hit Loaded Bubble when "Judgment Bubble" is in guilty state, you will soon be down.
②Judgement "Trial of the Ten Kings"
Changes the bubbles of an area to red in a cross-shaped.
③Judgement "Last Judgement"
Pops the bubbles on the row 1 from the top. All falling babbles are absorbed into "Mirror Cache".

■1 Song
・AlternaCrime / Girls Logic Observatory

■1 Challenge Stage
・Lv.8 Shikieiki Yamaxanadu Enters the Arena!

* Internet connection required for purchase.
* You will need to restart the game after purchasing contents.
name: Character Pack Shikieiki Yamaxanadu
